sources.title: Farmer Al Falfa's 20th Anniversary (1936)
sources.description: Farmer Al Falfa's 20th Anniversary is a Terrytoons cartoon directed by Mannie Davis, George Gordon. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/farmer-al-falfas-20th-anniversary-1936/

metadata.Plot: The barnyard animals throw Al a party commemorating his long career as an animated star. But as happened often before, and would again, uninvited skunks crash the affair, stink up the farmhouse, and all descends into destruction and chaos.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Barbera, Dan Gordon, Paul Terry
